Method Detail

generateRandomSegment

public Segment generateRandomSegment(PhysicsEnvironment physics,
                                     EntityEnvironment entities,
                                     WeaponEnvironment weapons,
                                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                                     int sliceAmount,
                                     Listener<java.lang.Integer> scoreListener)
Returns a randomly generated segment with specified amount of slices and position in the provided Game instance.

Parameters:
physics - the PhysicsEnvironment to run against.
entities - the EntityEnvironment to run against.
weapons - the WeaponEnvironment to run against.
position - The world-coordinates the Segment will be placed at in the physics world.
sliceAmount - The number of slices that the Segment should be built of.
Returns:
A random Segment at position built of sliceAmount number of slices.

generateRandomSegment

public Segment generateRandomSegment(PhysicsEnvironment physics,
                                     EntityEnvironment entities,
                                     WeaponEnvironment weapons,
                                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                                     int minSliceLength,
                                     int maxSliceLength,
                                     Listener<java.lang.Integer> scoreListener)
Returns a randomly generated segment with randomly generated amount of slices between the specified interval

Parameters:
physics - the PhysicsEnvironment to run against.
entities - the EntityEnvironment to run against.
weapons - the WeaponEnvironment to run against.
position - The world-coordinates the Segment will be placed at in the physics world.
minSliceLength - The highest number of Slices allowed.
maxSliceLength - The lowest number of Slices allowed.
Returns:
A random Segment at position built of a random number between minSliceLength and maxSliceLength number of slices.
